column1: Hamfast of Gamwich was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Hamfast lived in Gamwich. He was the father of Wiseman Gamwich
column4: he was the progenitor of the Gamwich Family (later Gamgee Family) family.

column1: The name Hamfast comes from Old English hámfæst
column2: meaning "stay-at-home". It was a translation of Westron Ranugad.
